label: Society for Psychical Research - London
column5: The Society for Psychical Research (SPR) is a non-profit organization based in London
column6: founded in 1882 to conduct scholarly and scientific research into human experiences that challenge contemporary scientific models

label: Institute for Frontier Areas of Psychology and Mental Health
column7: conducts interdisciplinary research on poorly understood frontier phenomena such as exceptional experiences and altered states of consciousness. It also offers public counseling
